mapper.insert:
insert into basicpivot (Length, StartId, High, Low, PivotType, Scratches) values
(#{pivot.length, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pivot.startId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pivot.high, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{pivot.low, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{pivot.pivotType, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pivot.scratches, jdbcType=CHAR})
